parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause complete brake failure, leading to accidents, injuries, and potentially fatalities.
symptoms: brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal goes to the floor
grinding or screeching noise when applying brakes
vehicle pulls to one side when braking
brake warning light illuminates on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
The sudden failure of the clutch pawl can cause the clutch to engage or disengage unexpectedly, leading to loss of control, accidents, or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pawl breaks without warning
the clutch engages or disengages unexpectedly
the vehicle experiences sudden loss of power or acceleration
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle seals can cause the loss of lubricant, leading to premature wear of the rear axle components, and potentially causing the rear axle to fail, which can lead to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: The rear axle seals leak lubricant
the rear axle makes noise or vibrates
the vehicle experiences difficulty accelerating or decelerating
the vehicle is difficult to steer.
